name: Minigames Master
description:
Minigames Master is a game in which you can play short minigames and speedrun them if you can. The game features parkour maps + minigames which you can use to train your minigame skills! Currently there are a few maps which are parkour. The map themes are lava and air. The game also has easy to learn game mechanics so everyone at all ages can play without learning alot. Currently there are parkour maps which you have to try and beat, or if you want to try and speedrun them!



Parkour maps: There are a few parkour maps, where the point is to try and beat as fast as possible.
Minigame maps: There are minigame maps which are supposed to represent classic minigames that you would find on other modern platforms.
Multiplayer support(still in works) There is going to be multiplayer support so you and your friends can try all of the maps!
Easy to learn game mechanics One of the things focused on the game was the easy to play style. So everyone, at all ages can play this game easily!
Completely community-driven game We try to focus new updates and map additions, based off of your feedback!


The game has to date only a few maps. The maps are:

Lava This is the lava level which you have to try and do the obstacles without falling in the lava. It has a difficult drop, and some easy jumps.
Air This is the air level where you are in the sky and have to try not to fall down. It has some clouds and a moving platform.
